description: Rules for implementing test-driven development practices
content:
# Test-First Rules

## Test Planning
- Write tests first
- Document requirements
- Consider security
- Plan edge cases
- Update documentation

## Test Implementation
- Implement tests
- Include security tests
- Document test cases
- Verify coverage
- Update status

## Test Execution
- Run tests regularly
- Check security tests
- Document results
- Fix failures
- Update progress

## Test Maintenance
- Update with changes
- Review coverage
- Check security
- Document updates
- Verify integrity
